```{r km, cache=cacheon}

kmfunc <- function(time, event, eventname, yposplus = rep(0, 4)) {
  cexmy <- 1.2

  levs <- levels(rsdata %>% pull(scream_ntprobnpstablepost))

  fit <- survfit(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "=='Yes') ~ scream_ntprobnpstablepost")),
    data = rsdata %>% filter(!is.na(scream_ntprobnpstablepost))
  )
  # c(bottom, left, top, right)
  par(mar = c(8.5, 8.6, 1, 5) + 0.1)
  plots <- plot(fit,
    # fun = "event",
    ylab = eventname,
    xscale = 365,
    yscale = 100,
    col = global_kicols,
    mark.time = FALSE,
    bty = "n",
    xlim = c(0, 3 * 365),
    ylim = c(0, 1),
    xlab = "Years",
    cex.lab = cexmy,
    axes = F,
    lwd = 3,
    lty = c(1, 2, 3, 4),
    xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i"
  )

  axis(2, seq(0, 1, 0.25), seq(0, 100, 25), las = 2, cex.axis = cexmy)
  axis(1, at = seq(0, 3, 1) * 365, seq(0, 3, 1), cex.axis = cexmy)

  ypos <- summary(fit, 364.5 * 3)$surv

  ylabs <- bind_cols(
    ypos = c(ypos + yposplus),
    ytext = levs
  )

  mtext(
    side = 4,
    line = .2,
    at = ylabs$ypos,
    ylabs$ytext,
    las = 1,
    cex = cexmy,
  )

  mtext("No. at risk", side = 1, line = 3.5, at = -340, adj = 0, cex = cexmy, font = 2)
  mtext(levs[1], side = 1, line = 4.5, at = -340, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)
  mtext(levs[2], side = 1, line = 5.5, at = -340, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)
  mtext(levs[3], side = 1, line = 6.5, at = -340, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)
  mtext(levs[4], side = 1, line = 7.5, at = -340, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)

  nrisk <- summary(fit, seq(0, 3, 1) * 365, extend = T)

  axis(1,
    at = seq(0, 3, 1) * 365, labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == paste0("scream_ntprobnpstablepost=", levs[1])],
    line = 3.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy
  )
  axis(1,
    at = seq(0, 3, 1) * 365, labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == paste0("scream_ntprobnpstablepost=", levs[2])],
    line = 4.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy
  )
  axis(1,
    at = seq(0, 3, 1) * 365, labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == paste0("scream_ntprobnpstablepost=", levs[3])],
    line = 5.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy
  )
  axis(1,
    at = seq(0, 3, 1) * 365, labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == paste0("scream_ntprobnpstablepost=", levs[4])],
    line = 6.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy
  )
}
```
